# Ch 5: virtualenv

## Setting up your virtual env

```
virtualenv ~/ds_intro -p /anaconda3/bin/python3.6
python -V

source ~/ds_intro/bin/activate
pip install pandas
pip install sklearn
pip install scipy
pip install jupyter

pip install seaborn
atom
pip install mpl_toolkits
pip install sympy
deactivate
```
